resources.string: NASA Image of the Day Viewer
This is the home screen. Here you can navigate to different sections of the app.
This is the calendar picker. Navigate to the desired date, click it, then click \'Fetch Image\' to open the Image Viewer
This is the saved URLs section. Here you can view and manage your saved URLs. Click one to open the Image Viewer
This is the Image Viewer. Here you can view the image, save/update it to your device, or delete it if desired
This is the Slide Show. This shows you a slideshow of all of your saved images.
